card_info.card_name: SAMSUNG AXIS BANK SIGNATURE Credit Card

conditions.minSpend: 3 card transactions for spends of any value within 30 days of credit card issuance

redemptionMethod.details: Cardholders can redeem the EDGE REWARDS by logging into www.edgerewards.axisbank.co.in or on Mobile app, open, under EDGE REWARDS section.

rewards.rewardDescription: 2500 EDGE REWARDS shall be credited to cardholders’ EDGE Loyalty account upon successful completion of 3 card transactions for spends of any value within 30 days of credit card issuance.

conditions.fieldDescription: Activation period in days from card issuance

applicableMerchantsOrDomains: Physical stores under ‘Brand EMI’ on Pinelabs terminals and Benow Soft POS
Samsung service centre payments made on PayU Soft POS

redemptionMethod.details: Cashback shall be credited in the next card statement cycle i.e., the card cycle following the cycle in which the transaction was made

rewards.rewardDescription: 10% cashback will be applicable on Samsung purchases capped to INR 2500 in a month and INR 10,000 in a year from date of card issuance.

conditions.fieldDescription: Maximum cashback amount per month in INR
Maximum cashback amount per year in INR

excludedMerchantsOrDomains: Spends on purchases of Samsung products and services
Purchases converted to EMI post facto on non-Samsung spends
Payment of card fees and other card charges

redemptionMethod.details: Cardholders can redeem the EDGE REWARD by logging into www.edgerewards.axisbank.co.in or on Mobile Banking app, open, under EDGE REWARDS section.

rewards.rewardDescription: Earn 5 EDGE REWARD Points on all domestic & international spends per INR 100 spent

excludedMerchantsOrDomains: Spends on purchases of Samsung products and services
Purchases converted to EMI post facto on non-Samsung spends
Payment of card fees and other card charges

redemptionMethod.details: Cardholders can redeem the EDGE REWARD by logging into www.edgerewards.axisbank.co.in or on Mobile Banking app, open, under EDGE REWARDS section.

rewards.rewardDescription: Earn 10 EDGE REWARD Points on all spends on preferred merchants per INR 100 spent
